movies.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
movies.description: The Guardians face new challenges and old friends as they embark on one last mission to protect one of their own.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who plunges Gotham City into chaos.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: A group of explorers travels through a wormhole in space to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: Avengers: Endgame
movies.description: After the devastating events of Infinity War, the Avengers assemble for a final battle against Thanos.

movies.title: Joker
movies.description: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck embarks on a downward spiral that leads to the birth of the Joker.

movies.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
movies.description: Spider-Man seeks help from Doctor Strange after his identity is revealed, leading to dangerous multiverse consequences.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.description: A hacker discovers that reality as he knows it is a simulation and joins a rebellion against the machines.

movies.title: Titanic
movies.description: A love story blossoms aboard the ill-fated RMS Titanic between Jack and Rose.

movies.title: Black Panther
movies.description: T'Challa returns to Wakanda as king and faces challenges to his sovereignty and kingdom.

movies.title: Doctor Strange
movies.description: A former surgeon learns the mystic arts and becomes a powerful sorcerer to defend Earth from magical threats.
